name: Police Stories (itch)
description:
Police Stories is a a fresh take on top-down shooters that puts an emphasis on tactics and forces you to make split second decisions. 

Unforgiving and tense, each mission is a story of police operatives John Rimes and Rick Jones, that involve infiltrating gang hideouts, rescuing hostages, making arrests and many other life-threatening situations. Don’t create any unnecessary casualties, push the perps to drop the weapon or shoot to kill – sometimes the situation leaves you with no other choice.

🚨 Live on Kickstarter!
